text:
Hey <!everyone> : there’s a community organized GitHub workshop happening soon. There will be mentors on-hand to guide you through some basic exercises and answer your questions.
 
<http://codeparkhouston.com/git-workshop/>

This will be a great way to get comfortable with Git and GitHub so you can organize/collaborate your own projects, contribute to existing ones, *get the most out of data jams*, and more.
If you’re already experienced using Git and GitHub, consider registering as a Mentor
<@U061A5N1G>: thanks for sharing it with us!
Can I share this information to others ?
